publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4282.1# Liam McArthur: Giving Blood, Giving the Gift of Life—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4282) in the name of Rhoda Grant, after "base" insert "; congratulates the 500 or so volunteers who supported the Scottish National Blood Transfusion Service’s pilot scheme in Orkney at the end of May and urges the service now to commit to providing regular opportunities for those in Orkney to donate blood". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-4282.1# Liam McArthur: Giving Blood, Giving the Gift of Life—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4282) in the name of Rhoda Grant, after "base" insert "; congratulates the 500 or so volunteers who supported the Scottish National Blood Transfusion Service’s pilot scheme in Orkney at the end of May and urges the service now to commit to providing regular opportunities for those in Orkney to donate blood".
S3M-4282.1# Giving Blood, Giving the Gift of Life (lodged on 3 June 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-4282.1# Giving Blood, Giving the Gift of Life (lodged on 3 June 2009) Tom McCabe*
